original_content:
This week Jonathan chats with Konstantinos Margaritis about SIMD programming. Why do these wide data instructions matter? Whats the state of Hyperscan, the project from Intel to power regex with SIMD? And what is Konstantinos connection to ARMs SIMD approach? Watch to find out!


VectorCamp:https://vectorcamp.gr
SIMD Info: https://simd.info
SIMD AI: https://simd.ai
VSCode plugin: https://code.simd.info


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or have the guest contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - SIMDプログラミングの重要性とは？
body: SIMDプログラミングについての会話と関連プロジェクトの紹介。
titles: - SIMDプログラミングの重要性とは？
- IntelのHyperscanプロジェクトとSIMDの関係
- ARMsのSIMDアプローチとの繋がりを探る
- FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャストのライブ収録を視聴する方法
